    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40c0bfcd-0ee8-40db-2b30-56ac27eed66b#1#8</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A jáki templom</string>
            <string language="en">The temple in Ják</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Bügel in Ják</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le temple dans Ják</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O temple em Ják</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il tempiale in Ják</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ναός σε Jαk</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El templo en Ják</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A jáki templom alapítása, építéstörténete, díszítése</string>
            <string language="en">the foundation, ornamentation and construction history of the temple in Ják</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">művészettörténet,  Ják,  romanika ,  építészet,  monostortemplom,  </string>
            <string language="en">art histrory, Ják, romanesque, architecture, abbey</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die Grundlage, Verzierung- und Aufbaugeschichte 
des Bügels in Ják</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'histoire de base, d'ornement et de construction 
du temple dans Ják</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o history da fundação, do ornamentation e da 
construção do temple em Ják</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la storia del fondamento, del ornamentation e 
della costruzione del tempiale in Ják</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η ιστορία ιδρύματος, διακοσμήσεων και οικοδόμησης του 
ναού σε Jαk</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la historia de la fundación, del ornamentation y 
de la construcción del templo en Ják</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kunst histrory, Ják, romanesque, Architektur, Abtei</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">art histrory, Ják, roman, architecture, abbaye</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arte histrory, Ják, romanesque, arquitetura, abadia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte histrory, Ják, romanesque, architettura, abbey</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τέχνη histrory, Jαk, romanesque, αρχιτεκτονική, 
αβαείο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arte histrory, Ják, romanesque, configuración, 
abadía</string>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
